overview: Chief Shell engineer Jaap Van Ballegooijen is passionate about saving the world's energy resources. Whilst under stress working in the south east Asia oil fields, he struggles to solve the problem of leaving "Undrillable" oil behind.  Under the increasing pressure from a local reporter, Jaap returns to his teenage son in Amsterdam who ultimately shows that, even with the biggest problems, inspiration can come from the most unlikely places.
tagline: A story inspired by real events
title: Eureka
